rows.label: tlk41310141_03_msg0002
rows.name:
It was a few years ago—
I happened to pass a Driver recruitment
test they were holding at the time.

rows.label: tlk41310141_03_msg0003
rows.name:
I just went with the flow, and before I knew it—
I was in the army.

rows.label: tlk41310141_03_msg0004
rows.name:
But their methods didn't suit me,
so I left, and was treated as a deserter.

rows.label: tlk41310141_03_msg0005
rows.name:
Now I'm safe in this Merc Group, but
I probably can't ever go back to Superbia.
